statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (2,-6) and (6,-3).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{3}-{\left(-{6}\right)}}}{{{6}-{\left({2}\right)}}}=\frac{{3}}{{4}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{3}}{{4}} (if it's not already reduced)
